item.description:
Jumbo Fac-Staffers,

This is your chance to get lost in the "world's most complex 3-D adventure cornfield maze." Davis' Mega Maze features more bridges than any other field maze in the world and the only double-decker bridge. As if that didn't make it complex enough, Davis' Mega Maze is the only field maze in the world that has the capacity to change every day. There are hundreds of ways to complete the maze and the experience will never be the same twice.

Tickets are as follows:
Ages Cost
under 5 Free
05-12 yrs $13
05-59 yrs $17
60+ yrs $13

There are discounts for AAA and WGBH members and for groups of 20+. For questions and directions, check out the Davis website at:

Davis Mega Maze

If you have any questions that can't be answered by the website, feel free to shoot me an email or post a question on the message board.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Tufts baseball cap, carrying a camera and small foam Jumbo and standing next to a blue Honda Fit.
item.name: Get Lost at Davis Mega Maze
